column2: BRIEF-Natural Gas Services Group Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.02 May 10 (Reuters) - Natural Gas Services Group Inc: * REG-NATURAL GAS SERVICES GROUP, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.02 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE $14.7 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $16.6 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
